code: import*as __vanilla_filescope__ from'@vanilla-extract/css/fileScope';__vanilla_filescope__.setFileScope("src/components/NavBar/MenuDropdown.css.ts","@uniswap/interface");import{style}from'@vanilla-extract/css';import{sprinkles,themeVars,vars}from'../../nft/css/sprinkles.css';export var hover=style([sprinkles({transition:'250',borderRadius:'12'}),{':hover':{background:vars.color.lightGrayOverlay}}],"hover");export var MenuRow=style([hover,sprinkles({color:'textPrimary',paddingY:'8',paddingX:'8',width:'full',whiteSpace:'nowrap'}),{lineHeight:'24px',textDecoration:'none'}],"MenuRow");export var PrimaryText=style([{lineHeight:'24px'}],"PrimaryText");export var SecondaryText=style([hover,sprinkles({paddingY:'8',paddingX:'8',color:'textSecondary',width:'full'}),{lineHeight:'20px'}],"SecondaryText");export var Separator=style([sprinkles({height:'0',marginX:'16'}),{borderTop:'solid',borderColor:themeVars.colors.backgroundOutline,borderWidth:'1px'}],"Separator");export var IconRow=style([sprinkles({paddingX:'16',justifyContent:{sm:'center',md:'flex-start'}})],"IconRow");__vanilla_filescope__.endFileScope();
